Verses: 1 karththarukkup Pudhuppaattaip Paadungal; Avar Adhisayangalai Seydhirukkiraar; Avarudaiya Valadhukaramum, Avarudaiya Parisuththa Puyamum, Ratchippai Undaakkinadhu.
2 karththar Thamadhu Ratchippaip Pirasthaabamaakki, Thamadhu Needhiyai Jaadhigaludaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Vilangappanninaar.
3 avar Isravel Kudumbaththukkaagath Thamadhu Kirubaiyaiyum Unmaiyaiyum Ninaivukoorndhaar; Boomiyin Ellaigalellaam Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Ratchippaik Kandadhu.
4 boomiyin Kudigale, Neengalellaarum Karththarai Nokki Aanandhamaai Aarppariyungal; Muzhakkamittu Gembeeramaaip Paadungal.
5 suramandalaththaal Karththaraik Keerththanampannungal, Suramandalaththaalum Geedhasaththaththaalum Avaraik Keerththanampannungal.
6 karththaraagiya Raajaavin Samugaththil Poorikaigalaalum Ekkaala Saththaththaalum Aanandhamaai Aarppariyungal.
7 samuththiramum Adhin Niraivum, Poochchakkaramum Adhin Kudigalum Muzhanguvadhaaga.
8 karththarukku Munbaaga Aarugal Kaikotti, Parvadhangal Egamaai Gembeeriththup Paadakkadavadhu.
9 avar Boomiyai Niyaayandheerkkavarugiraar; Boologaththai Needhiyodum Janangalai Nidhaanaththodum Niyaayantheerppaar.
